meanings.definition: A plant of the mint family, typically with aromatic leaves.
meanings.sent1: The menta in the garden smelled so fresh and minty.
meanings.sent2: I brewed tea using menta leaves from our backyard.
meanings.sent3: The menta plant whispered to the other herbs, 'I'm the coolest in the garden.'
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the menta plant, spreading a refreshing aroma around.
meanings.sent5: The menta leaves danced in the breeze, releasing their delightful scent.

meanings.definition: A flavoring made from the extract of peppermint leaves.
meanings.sent1: The ice cream had a delicious hint of menta flavor.
meanings.sent2: She added a drop of menta to the chocolate for a refreshing taste.
meanings.sent3: The menta flavor in the drink tickled his taste buds and made him smile.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like menta, adding a refreshing twist to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The menta essence filled the room, making everyone crave a cool treat.

meanings.definition: A green color resembling that of mint leaves.
meanings.sent1: The walls were painted in a calming menta shade.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful dress in a lovely menta color.
meanings.sent3: The menta hue of the car made it stand out in the parking lot.
meanings.sent4: The menta sky stretched above, a soothing backdrop to the city.
meanings.sent5: The menta paint on the fence brightened up the entire yard.
